desc: 100% Merino Wool base layers for babies and toddlers. Woolly Tots are ethically sourced and intentionally designed for versatility depending on the weather and your activity - skiing, camping, playing at the park, hiking, or hanging on the couch- to be worn all on their own or as your kiddo's favorite new base layer.

layout.text: ORDERS SHIP IN 1 TO 3 BUSINESS DAYS!
